page.title: 10PROVISION FOR THE ELDERLY
page.content: PROVISION FOR THE ELDERLY IS CENTRED ON DOBWALLS. THERE IS A BRANCH OF{AGE {CONCERN}WHICH PROVIDES A LUNCHEON CLUB ON THURSDAYS, WITH MEALS ON WHEELS FOR THE HOUSEBOUND. A CHIROPODY CLINIC IS ALSO HELD THEN. THEY MEET IN THE MEMORIAL HALL. MEALS ON WHEELS ARE DELIVERED BY OTHER VOLUNTEERS ON THE OTHER WEEKDAYS. A{GOOD COMPANIONS}CLUB MEETS ON WEDNESDAYS FOR SOCIAL ACTIVITIES AND A {LADIES BRIGHT HOUR}FOR MORE RELIGIOUS ONES,ON TUESDAYS. HEALTH PROVISION AND DAY CARE IS ALL IN LISKEARD OR PLYMOUTH. LACK OF TRANSPORT CAN THEREFORE BE A PROBLEM. BOTH DOCTORS SURGERIES, THE DENTISTS AND THE PHYSIOTHERAPIST ARE IN LISKEARD,BUT ALL ARE GOOD AT ARRANGING HOME VISITS. ALTHOUGH SERVICES ARE STRETCHED,PEOPLE ARE VERY AWARE OF THE NEEDS OF THE ELDERLY.
